testcase.name: show new theme form - Should return OK status
create new theme - Should redirect to the /themes route
create new theme with invalid field - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
create new theme with repeated theme - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit theme form - Should return OK status
show edit theme form with invalid theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
show edit theme form with null theme id - Should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit theme - Should redirect to the /themes/theme/{themeId} route
edit theme with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit theme with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit theme with repeated theme - should return BAD_REQUEST status
edit theme with invalid field - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete theme form - should return OK status
show delete theme form with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
show delete theme form with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete theme - Should redirect to the /themes route
delete theme with invalid theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete theme with null theme id - should return BAD_REQUEST status
delete theme without check field - should return BAD_REQUEST status
